meanings.definition: A period of four years reckoned from one celebration of the Olympic Games to the next.
meanings.sent1: During the olympiads, athletes from around the world compete in various sports.
meanings.sent2: The olympiads bring together athletes from different countries to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent3: The olympiads are like a global sports party that happens every four years.
meanings.sent4: In the olympiads, nations strive for victory and glory on the world stage.
meanings.sent5: The olympiads mark a time when the world unites in friendly competition.

meanings.definition: A participant in the Olympic Games.
meanings.sent1: The olympiads train hard to represent their countries in the games.
meanings.sent2: Many young athletes dream of becoming olympiads and winning medals.
meanings.sent3: The olympiads proudly march in the opening ceremony, waving their flags.
meanings.sent4: To be an olympiad is to embody the spirit of sportsmanship and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The olympiads inspire future generations to pursue their athletic dreams.
